Package controller

Interface PortfolioController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PortfolioControllerImpl
    public interface PortfolioController
    This is an interface which contains all the methods for the portfolio controller.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      PortfolioImpl addStock()
      Method that adds a stock into a portfolio.
      PortfolioImpl afterAddingStock​(PortfolioImpl model)
      Method used to write into portfolio after adding a stock.
      void controllerToViewHelper​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​StocksImpl> portfolioEntries)
      Fetches the data from the model for each argument and passes it to view.
      void viewSpeculate​(java.lang.String input, ListOfStocksImpl listOfStocksImpl)
      Method used to view speculate of a portfolio.

      Method that is used as helper for speculation of a portfolio.

    • Method Detail

      • addStock

        PortfolioImpl addStock()
                throws java.io.IOException
        Method that adds a stock into a portfolio.
        Returns:
        Portfolio after adding a stock.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the stock is invalid or if the amount to be added is invalid.

      • afterAddingStock

        PortfolioImpl afterAddingStock​(PortfolioImpl model)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Method used to write into portfolio after adding a stock.
        Parameters:
        model - takes the model into which the stock is entered.
        Returns:
        portfolio after saving the stock into it.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the input parameter is invalid.

      • viewSpeculate

        void viewSpeculate​(java.lang.String input,
                   ListOfStocksImpl listOfStocksImpl)
            throws java.io.IOException
        Method used to view speculate of a portfolio.
        Parameters:
        input - file name.
        listOfStocksImpl - list of the stocks present in the portfolio.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the input name is invalid.

      • viewSpeculateHelper

        boolean viewSpeculateHelper​(java.lang.String name,
                            ListOfStocksImpl listOfStocksImpl)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Method that is used as helper for speculation of a portfolio.
        Parameters:
        name - file to be speculated.
        listOfStocksImpl - stocks in the portfolio in the form of a list.
        Returns:
        true if the file is valid else false.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - invalid input.

      • controllerToViewHelper

        void controllerToViewHelper​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​StocksImpl> portfolioEntries)
        Fetches the data from the model for each argument and passes it to view.
        Parameters:
        portfolioEntries - has the list of portfolios.
